name: Dream Eater
description:
Dream Eater was made for #shortnsweetjam, a game jam all about using cute art to make a bite-sized game.

Amble your way through a surreal dreamscape in Dream Eater, as you explore and gather fragments of other people's dreams. Collect as many fragments as you can before you reach the end of the game.

Game controls:

  • Right/Left Arrow or A/D: move around
  • Space: jump
  • Up/Down Arrow or W/ S: move up/down ladders
  • Enter: exit message box

Updates:

September 9, 2017

  • Lots of polish; smoothed out ending
  • Text messages should be clearer to read

August 20, 2017

  • Refined butterfly/message window behavior
  • Updated ending

August 17, 2017

  • Added Dream Messages
  • Fixed movement & collisions
  • Removed powerups to streamline experience
  • Fixed various graphical glitches

August 15, 2017

  • Game is released!

Known issues:

  • Missing some planned features of the game (still in progress)
  • Can fall through ladders (´｡•ㅅ•｡`)

A Dessert Club Production
